_header: Why war and wrack in land
Subjects: Edward II; evils of the times; historical poems; satires; simony
_description: Þe simonie, on the Evil Times of the reign of Edward II — in 6-line stanzas including wheel and bob

CamPeter104.First Lines:
Why werre & wrake in londe & manslaugter ys y comeWhy
                    honger & derthe on erthe þe þoure hath euer
                    nome…
CamPeter104.Last Lines:
…& hongre & pestilence in ech lond as ȝe mow ofte
                    hereouer albut if we mande vs it wil wel wers be fal
